DEPTH = 256;            -- The size of memory in words
WIDTH = 32;             -- The size of data in bits
ADDRESS_RADIX = DEC;    -- The radix for address values
DATA_RADIX = BIN;       -- The radix for data values
CONTENT                 -- Start of (address: data pairs)
BEGIN

-- Instruction 0
0: 00000000000000000000000000110011; -- addi x0, x0, 0

-- Instruction 1
1: 00000000000100000000000000110011; -- addi x1, x0, 8

-- Instruction 2
2: 00000000001000000000000000110011; -- addi x2, x0, 4

-- Instruction 3
3: 00000000001100010000000000100111; -- or x3, x1, x2

-- Instruction 4
4: 00000000010000000001000000100111; -- or x4, x2, x0

-- Instruction 5
5: 00000000001100100001000000110011; -- add x6, x4, x2

-- Instruction 6
6: 00000000010000000000000000010011; -- addi x4, x0, 2

-- Instruction 7
7: 11111111111000000000000000100011; -- addi x5, x0, -2

-- Instruction 8
8: 00000010001000001000001000110011; -- sll x18, x1, x4

-- Instruction 9
9: 00000010001000101000001000110011; -- srl x19, x5, x4

-- Instruction 10
10: 01000010001000101000001000110011; -- sra x20, x5, x4

-- Instruction 11
11: 00000010001000010001000000100011; -- slt x21, x1, x2

-- Instruction 12
12: 00000010001000100001000000100011; -- slt x22, x2, x1

-- Instruction 13
13: 01000010010000101001000000100011; -- sltu x23, x5, x1

-- Instruction 14
14: 01000010001000101001000000100011; -- sltu x24, x1, x5

-- Instruction 15
15: 00000010001000001000100000100011; -- slti x25, x1, 8

-- Instruction 16
16: 00000010001000001001000000100011; -- slti x26, x1, 16

-- Instruction 17
17: 11111111111000000000000000110011; -- addi x5, x0, -4

-- Instruction 18
18: 01000010001000001001100000100011; -- sltiu x27, x1, -2

-- Instruction 19
19: 11111111111000001001100000100011; -- sltiu x28, x5, -2

-- Instruction 20
20: 00000010101000001001100000100011; -- slli x29, x5, 1

-- Instruction 21
21: 01000010101000001001100000100011; -- srli x30, x5, 1

-- Instruction 22
22: 01000010110000001001100000100011; -- srai x31, x5, 1

-- Instruction 23
23: 00000010101000001000001000010011; -- xori x6, x1, 10

-- Instruction 24
24: 00000011001000001000001000010011; -- ori x7, x1, 2

-- Instruction 25
25: 00000011101000001000001000010011; -- andi x8, x1, 10

-- Instruction 26
26: 00000001101000100001000000110011; -- xor x9, x1, x2

END;
